# GET /v1/subscriptionPricePoints/{id}/relationships/equalizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptionPricePoints/{id}/relationships/equalizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPricePoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations)

-  GET /v1/subscriptionPricePoints/{id}/relationships/equalizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptionPricePoints/{id}/relationships/equalizations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPricePoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptionPricePoints/{id}/relationships/equalizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPricePoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPricePoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `8000`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPricePoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionPricePointEqualizationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionpricepointequalizationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPricePoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-subscriptionPricePoints-_id_-relationships-equalizations#Endpoints)

[`Read Subscription Price Point Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionpricepoints-_id_)Get details about a specific subscription price point.[`List All Subscription Price Point Equalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptionpricepoints-_id_-equalizations)Get a list of subscription price points and their equivalent in a specified currency.[`Create a Subscription Price Change`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-subscriptionprices)Schedule a subscription price change for a specific territory.[`Delete Subscription Prices`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-subscriptionprices-_id_)Delete a scheduled price change for an auto-renewable subscription.
